website_summaries.verdict: While it's compatible with some other brands, this model is built especially to protect the popular ESP brand electric bass, offering a form-fitting mold and hard-shell case for a high level of protection.
pros: The form-fitting interior keeps the instrument securely in place, and the hard-shell case can withstand any moderate dings during transport
Comes in sizes intended for ESP's F-style and B-style bass guitars, with size options available for each
Interior is roomy enough to carry multiple accessories when traveling
cons: Case is a little heavier than some models, which provides good support for air travel but could cause issues for some users when carrying

customer_reviews.title: Showed up missing a latch and didn't fit my F-415FM
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a case with a snug fit and figured getting one that was specifically for ESP F series would work well. Wrong. The case arrived missing a latch. It wasn't in the box so it's not even like it came off in transit. Even if the latch wasn't missing, the case seems pretty flimsy especially for the price. I would think the case should have been at least flush when latched but the whole thing seemed pretty shoddy. And to top it off, my bass didn't even fit in the case. So much nope that I should have just sucked it up and went to guitar center for a generic case.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap rivets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Decent case. Fits my F-4E bass like a glove. My #1 problem with this case stems from the fact the latches and handle are riveted on. The handle came apart after I had the case for about 2 months. It was easily fixed with a few wood screws, but with it being brand new, i shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson Okie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Got the case for my F4-E bass. Fits well. Very solid. Wish it was a little lighter. Weighs more than the bass. My biggest issue though is the one latch that comes undone way too easy. Good thing the other 3 work well. Disappointing for the price. Bought 2 other cheaper cases for other guitars and they are much better overall quality. Feel bad saying that. At least ESP makes awesome instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Burns Jr.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and has a large enough compartment to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy, and has a large enough compartment to fit my accoutrements. Well worth it. This case perfectly fits my ESP LTD F Bass and allows me to store, travel and carry my Bass in safety and security. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have two F-Series Basses and a TA-600. I bought a case just like this five years ago for $140 that had a black interior material instead of gray like this one has. You have to force the bass guitar into the case to get it to fit but once you get it squeezed in there, the bass is protected well. I like the large storage compartment as it's big enough to fit extra string packs, tools, etc... Overall, the quality is good. Although it's not perfect, it will be road worthy enough to do what it's intended for.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great case but I got the wrong one. D'oh!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great case. Perfect in every way except one. It was the wrong one for my model bass. Wrote to ESP via Amazon about exchanging it but got no reply but they did grant me my refund. If this was the style I was looking for I'd be stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Protection, Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a perfect fit for my ESP LTD B-208 bass. It is solid and well-made, similar to the Fender Pro cases. If you own a B series ESP bass, you need this case.
customer_reviews.author: Wickett

customer_reviews.title: Fair product but latches are loose after snapping shut.
customer_reviews.text: Nice snug fit for the bass, nice roomy compartment for things, kind of heavy, the latches seem to be a little loose after you snap them shut. Overall it does the job but I wished I would've gotten a different type case like my molded hardshell case for my other bass.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hard case for my six string bass
customer_reviews.text: Good hard case. Gets the job done but could use some improvement on the inside of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.  Look up your ESP bass model to verify yours is made for this product.
customer_reviews.text: This case fits like a glove on a bass that it is made for. The only complaint is that I wish it was a molded case with the embedded logo. Molded cases tend to last longer from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Cool hard case
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bass hard case. The interior needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case for ESP Bass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for an ESP LTD B-154DX Bass. It came in perfect condition and it fit the bass perfectly. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: This case fits my ESP LTD B-5E bass like a glove
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my ESP LTD B-5E bass like a glove! Very nice and soft interior with one big compartment for accessories. This case has held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Garza

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid case. Fits my LTD B-5E ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid case. Fits my LTD B-5E perfectly and has one big compartment to store my tools and batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Guitar case a Star fit
customer_reviews.text: Can,t beat getting a guitar case by the very same people that make your guitar. Couldn't afford it when i bought my bass but I'm glad I got it. Shipping was so extremely quick! The price was comparable to other shops but with an account already with Amazon, it was a no brainer to shop with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G. Edelen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Case had a few blemishes from shipping but the Bass is snug and theres lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: I'mjustaBill

customer_reviews.title: Guitar case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Very happy I went with the factory one. Guitar fits nice and snug inside. Nice sized compartment for odd ball stuff. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: drevans009

customer_reviews.title: ESP LTD BASS GUITAR CASE
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for my Brother for Christmas for his ESP LTD B bass guitar , its a nice case for the money. I found it at Sam Ash for 89.99 new . bass fits in case well hardware looks to be decent , large ESP logo adds a little pizzaz..great bang for the buck and way better than a gig bag . Will buy one for my ESP Bass soon Ok its been 6 months and itsmfalling apart , broken latch and in general falling apart True junk !
customer_reviews.author: RC GLIDER GUIDER

product_meta.title: ESP LTD B-Style Electric Bass Guitar Case
product_meta.description: Style:B Bass Form FitProtect your instrument with the ESP LTD B Style Bass Guitar Case. This excellent form fit case from ESP is designed specifically for all ESP LTD B series basses and will keep it in tip-top shape so you'll always be ready to rock, night after night.
feature_bullets: The CBBASSFF will fit all B-Series ESP/LTD basses
ESP Logo on top of the case
Heavy-Duty with Neck Support and Form Fit to the body to keep your bass protected

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
